Oliver Schmitz (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri na odee ihe nkiri nke South Africa

E gosipụtara ihe nkiri ya Mapantsula na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na 1988 Cannes Film Festival. E gosipụtakwara ihe nkiri ya nke afọ 2010 Life, Above All na ngalaba Un Certain Regard na 2010 Cannes Film Festival ma họrọ ya dị ka ntinye South Africa maka Best Foreign Language Film na 83rd Academy Awards. Ọ pụtara na nhọpụta ndị a mara n'ọkwa na Jenụwarị 2011.
